item.title: basic
item.description: Resource Slide: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/e/2PACX-1vRjb_W1Vo9-zD9F4FmWOiB6K4ezkF6W64OKcX7bZD6ordKvOT-6LFoGi0le-HzT2ABKudDNhr_qKt2x/pub?start=false&loop=false&delayms=3000&slide=id.g2074c710b4_0_293 2017/09/24 Updated 自R-CRAN安裝套件 當使用install.packages("package_name")時，就會自R-cran搜尋是否有該套件，有的話就會將該套件安裝到你的電腦中。(The package will be downloaded and installed to your computer, BUT not yet loaded into your current environment.)例如：install.packages("tidyverse") 此時，雖然該套件已經安裝在你的電腦中，但並不代表你現在的程式可以使用它，你必須要使用library(package_name)將其匯入或引入目前的程式執行環境中。 library(jsonlite) library(httr) Try to get data load(url("http://varianceexplained.org/files/trump_tweets_df.rda")) df <- trump_tweets_df fliter.df <- df[df$favoriteCount > mean(df$favoriteCount) +2*sd (df$favoriteCount),] # View(fliter.df) fliter.df2 <- df[df$retweetCount > mean(df$retweetCount) + 2* sd (df$retweetCount),] order.df <- df[order(df$favoriteCount, decreasing = TRUE),] # View(order.df[1:10,]) plotting hist(df$favoriteCount, breaks = 1000) df$nchar <-nchar (df$text) hist(df$nchar, breaks= 1000) # View(order.
